title: The Cnidarians
text:
This website hosts The Cnidarians. A book about‚Ä¶ you guessed it, Cnidaria.   The book is currently being written‚Ä¶ IN THE OPEN! üò±   What does that mean exactly? Well, it means you can follow along on this journey over the coming months, years, or however long it takes me to write this‚Ä¶   I‚Äôve always considered writing a book a daunting task and perhaps a lonely one. This is why I‚Äôve chosen to write this book out of the attic. It‚Äôs an experiment of mine. I wanted to see if sharing this journey with you, and receiving feedback during the process could make this all a little more fun, and hopefully a fairer representation of Cnidaria!





Image by Ganapathy Kumar at Unsplash
